title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]Better Sugar Cane更好的甘蔗mod
author: MC丶贱筑师
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPE__HaiKuo 于 2015-2-22 00:21 编辑 
大家好哈，时隔几个月，小涂的号终于找回来了，今天给大家搬运的是Better Sugar Cane更好的甘蔗mod！！！


你是不是发愁甘蔗只能做糖和纸？
别担心
按了这个模组
一切都不成问题！！！


翻译祭的度娘翻译，稍加改动


模组介绍更好的甘蔗模组，让甘蔗有了更多的作用
这些用途包括：
1更多工具
2食品
3更多方块
工具信息
可以用甘蔗合成棍棒甘蔗
然后可以制作工具
金制：专业作死
铁质：主要输出
钻石：快速开采速度

从上图中可以看到

更多内容自行探索！！！谢谢收看！！！下载地址

replies.author: MC丶贱筑师
replies.txt_content:
原文


 Discontinued!

Better Sugar Cane is a mod that aims to give more uses to sugar cane.

These uses will include:

Upgraded tools (Planned mod support)
Food (Sugar cookies!)
Blocks (And compressed versions!)
Images can be found in the Images section.

If you want all recipes use NEI.

Tool info:

Iron, Gold and Diamond tools can be made with Sugar Cane Rods instead of sticks for special effects

Gold: Specializes in enchantability

Iron: Specializes in damage

Diamond: Specializes in mining speed

All tools are upgraded to a mining level of obsidian and have greatly inceased durability at the cost of using blocks instead of ingots for recipes
额，这介绍也太简单了吧而且我一直觉得甘蔗的材质不对（难道MOJANG的人没见过甘蔗。。
